Don't just upload photos,
Captures memories and share them with ohers

features.title: List of all features
features.description: Here's a list of all features you can find inside Echomori

albums.label: Albums
albums.feature6: And so much more (Rename, Configure views, Sort your photos, ...)

images.label: Photos
images.feature4: Access to their metadata (ISO, Focal length, Contrast, Exposure, GPS Data, ...)
images.feature6: And so much more (Rename, Full-screen visualisation, ...)

sharing.label: Sharing
sharing.feature2: Manage all your links in one place
sharing.feature6: Directly share to your contacts using their email address

success.title: Comment sent
success.description: Your comment has been posted successfully

privacy.content:
If you are logged in, your name will appear above your comment.
If you are not logged in but this folder has been shared with you by e-mail, the first part of your e-mail address will appear above your comment.
If you are not logged in and this file has been shared with you via a link, your comment will be anonymous.

Comments are only shared with people who have access to the folder.

uploadImagesForm.label: Upload images

errors.not-enough-storage: You don't have enough storage remaining to upload {name}. Your used storage is {used} / {max}.
errors.invalid-file: {name} isn't a file you can upload. Files must be either image or video.

section1.title: Create your album
section1.description: To organize your photos, you first need to create an album. You can create one from the sidebar, using the '<kbd>'Ctrl'</kbd>' + '<kbd>'K'</kbd>' palette or simply by right-clicking anywhere in the app.

section2.title: Upload your photos
section2.description: Once your album is created, you can directly upload your photos inside it by drag and drop them inside your album or by clicking on the upload button.

section3.title: Talk with your memories
section3.description: Chat with an assitant to remember your memories. You can also add comments to your photos to remember the context of the moment.

section4.title: Share your memories
section4.description: Share your album with your friends and family. You can share it with a link or by adding their email address.

question1.title: How to create a new folder ?
question1.answer: You can create a new folder by clicking on the 'New folder' button in the sidebar, by using the '<kbd>'Ctrl'</kbd>' + '<kbd>'K'</kbd>' palette or by right-clicking anywhere in the app.

question2.title: How to upload images ?
question2.answer: You can upload images by dragging and dropping them inside your folder or by clicking on the upload button.

question3.title: I don't want to share an album anymore, how to do ?
question3.answer: You can manage all your sharing links under your links management page where you'll find two tables: one for the sharing links and one for the people you shared your album with. You can edit links properties or delete them at anytime.

question4.title: Can I change my email address ?
question4.answer: Yes ! You can change your email address in the account settings page. You will need to verify your new email address.

question5.title: Hows are my photos stored ?
question5.answer: Your photos are stored on our servers in a secure way. We use the latest technologies to ensure the security of your data.
